sources.name: AnimeHay
sources.script: (function() { var items = []; document.querySelectorAll('.movie-item, .item').forEach(e => { var link = e.querySelector('a')?.href; var title = e.querySelector('.name')?.innerText || e.querySelector('.title')?.innerText; var poster = e.querySelector('img')?.src || e.querySelector('img')?.getAttribute('data-original'); if(link && title) items.push({ title: title.trim(), link: link, poster: poster || '', sourceName: 'AnimeHay' }); }); return JSON.stringify(items); })();
